Text: this is the same as "Paranormal Activity [2009] dvd rip nlx" which has festival ending
As sinand99 alludes to, this is the original festival version with an alternate ending and not the theatrical ending. I'd say the theatrical ending (it's on youtube) is better.

this is bullshit it says its a full movie then once dl it goes past the 22 minute point on pc but when u try to rip to dvd using convertx it says the file is only 22 mins long why wont it come up properly when ur ripping it? but anyway if u put on harddrive or leave on pc good dl but if u want to burn to dvd not worth a pinch of shit a/v = 8 otherwise
